keywords.value: North Shore-Long Island Jewish Health System
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Mr. Dowling, chief executive of Northwell Health, who grew up in an impoverished area of Ireland, focuses on finding flexible employees who can handle the unexpected with grace.

headline.print_headline: If It Can’t Be Done, You Haven’t Tried
headline.main: Michael J. Dowling: If It Can’t Be Done, You Haven’t Tried

snippet: Mr. Dowling, chief executive of Northwell Health, who grew up in an impoverished area of Ireland, focuses on finding flexible employees who can handle the unexpected with grace.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Michael J Dowling, chief executive officer of healthcare network Northwell Health, who discusses his career and management style.
